name: Brian H
text: Walked in to grab an order of bread sticks real quick. 2 employees were behind counter and said they would be right with me. Waited for a few minutes listening to them talk about their previous jobs at Baskin Robbins. Was the only customer ‚Ä¶More

name: kathleen davis
text: I ordered a pizza for pick up. The gentleman who answered the phone was patient, friendly, and sincere when answering my questions. I ordered a large thin crust pepperoni and green bell pepper pizza. Flavor was great however the pizza crust was a little tough.

name: James White
text: I used to go to Hungry Howies all the time growing up in Michigan. This was my first experience since moving to Arizona. Tried to call but no answer. As I pull Into the parking lot I see the lights are on and they are open for business. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Dempsay
text: Quick and expert service from the staff working at Hungry Howies on 35th ave and Bethany Home. Very attentive and quiet location with lots of weekly specials and coupons including a $7.99 2 topping large pizza or Mix and Match $5.99 unlimited special.

name: Sabrina Finklea-Strickland
text: Great taste and great price.  I love the flavor crust concept. Was not sure how I felt about it at first but, loved it.

name: Denisha Austin
text: My kids 1st taste of Howies they were complaining at 1st because of the name hahaha... but the pizza was fresh and hot had extra cheddar and Parmesan cheese baked into it, it was delish thank you.

text: This is the best Hungry Howie's! The best pizza. The best subs, and absolutely best service. Brent our driver was hands down the BEST driver they have.. he was prompt and provided excellent customer service. Give this guy a promotion!!!

name: Daniel Zur
text: Fast, super friendly service, Literally, the best prices in Phoenix on quality, fresh made pizza and in the entire Valley of the Sun!  Thanks for making my 40th birthday party the most special one yet! Love you guys and gals, you're the best, simply amazing, and your food is out of this world!

name: Adam Hilburn
text: Good thing they have flavored crust because it was pretty good and it almost makes up for the atrociously bland pizza sauce. Unfortunately nothing made up for the attitude being thrown by the cashier taking our order because we weren't using the mobile app and didn't know right away what we wanted to order when we walked in.
